title: Enhancing Machine Learning Practical Competencies: E-Learning System User Experience Improvement Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can derive over 80% of e-learning interface improvement requirements by applying user testing methodologies.
Learners can establish UX improvement strategies by integrating quantitative and qualitative data using mixed research methodologies.
Learners can iteratively redesign actual D2L LMS templates at least three times through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
